projects.title: Easy FLow
projects.description:
• Used Stack Spring Boot, Android (Kotlin), Angular, Redis (Caching), MySQL database.
• QR code technology for ticket validation at turnstile machines, for seamless passenger experience.
• secured authentication and authorization using JWT (JSON Web Tokens) for enhanced system security.
• backend developed using Spring Boot with applied design patterns, creating RESTful APIs for data retrieval and manipulation implemented database operations using MySQL.
• Deployed the application on AWS EC2 virtual machine with amazon Linux OS

projects.title: Borrowing Library System
projects.description:
• Developed a generic search engine for an ERP system using Spring Boot as the backend and Antlr for context-free grammar parsing, followed scrum agile methodology collaborating in a team of 7.
• Utilized a MySQL database and implemented custom repositories for efficient data retrieval.
• Contributed to the development of functionalities, including search algorithms and query processing.
